package.name: Coolbooter
package.shortDescription: Tether downgrade 32-bit devices to any version!

descriptionlist.description: CoolBooter is a dual booting utility for 32 bit iOS devices.
Make sure to backup any files you are not willing to loose, I and the author will not be held responsible for data loss, you have been warned
For your safety,this coolbooter won't install on 64-bit devices

changelog.change: You can now use a separate passcode on the secondary OS
The full changelog is on tge iphone wiki
